text: Up Close & Personal is a 1996 American romantic drama movie directed by Jon Avnet and starring Robert Redford, Michelle Pfeiffer, Stockard Channing, Joe Mantegna, Kate Nelligan, Glenn Plummer, Scott Bryce, Dedee Pfieffer. It was based on the 1988 novel Golden Girl: The Story of Jessica Savitch by Alanna Nash. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1997. ==Other websites== * * Category:1996 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jon Avnet Category:Movies set in Philadelphia Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Movies about journalists Category:Movies about television
title: Up Close & Personal
